pluginCategory.description: Lablicate's collection of proprietary file format converters for OpenChrom. Installation is required for additional vendor support. Please select the converter depending on which instrument software is in use.
pluginCategory.name: Proprietary OpenChrom File Format Converters

pluginCategory.description: Commercial software to boost productivity. Requires marketplace account and a valid license. Students may a apply for significant discounts when registering with an institutional e-Mail address.
pluginCategory.name: OpenChrom Extensions
